showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ parking. Friendly staff. They have a Subway inside and a pizza place. Good coffee. They have dipping dots too. They do have a shower and restrooms. It's also located right beside Sheetz and Clarences Steakhouse which is a great restaurant.
The people are great to deal with and nice place eat shower and lay down for the night
Small little place but it's nice to have a shower in the area nice people

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean location, tons of truck parking. Shower is hot. Clean. Staff was great and friendly. Overall good location. Good amount of grass to walk the dogs.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Being on the road trip from GA to VA I had stopped by to fuel my car and also decided to take a shower from this location.  Based on internet search which states "At Love's Travel Stops, a shower typically costs between $10 and $17."  which ‚Ä¶

So i work on the road and I travel to a lot of truck stops. If you're a trucker paying almost $20 for a shower, pay close attention. For one, this location is filthy. Me being in an area where I dont really have a selection for another ‚Ä¶

I can't say about the rest of this truckstop  but to find that kind of nasty on the towel hooks next to the shower in shower number five is a new kind of ick. It looks like used toilet ring wax was scraped off someone's boot.

Maria got so funky with me over the showers that I proved charged me twice. She said I‚Äôd have to HIT purchase which means she failed to listen when I said I only opened the app to see if any were available. Insult to injury the shower ‚Ä¶

Everything was clean, the staff was friendly extremely helpful especially the young lady Ashanti went above and beyond, from setting me up on shower service to laundry and even doing research to help me buy a laptop. Overall 5 star service ‚Ä¶
Great place to stop or stay. Have McDonald's , Chester's, 5 shower, laundry ! 2 washer, 4 dryer. Everything was nice and clean. Staff was friendly. Good size of truck parking.

Stopped in last night for a shower. It was a horrible experience. The shower room had mold, was dirty, hot and no cold water at all. It felt like a sauna and the woman's bathroom felt the same way hot. Which makes it very unpleasant. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The two that work the night shift have no idea how to do their jobs nor run the shower board.  I signed in on the app to get a shower and waited until it told me that shower 3 was ready.  I get inside and shower 3 was occupied.  I tried to ‚Ä¶

Shower room was dirty someone shaved and hair was on the sink toilet was nasty and shower hadn‚Äôt been cleaned asked for another shower and they were all dirty one had pizza crust everywhere nastiest LOVES I‚Äôve been too

showerReviews.reviewText: Polite staff, dirty showers, small parking lot, luckily had a parking reservation. They have three showers; you can't reserve the shower on the Pilot app, you have to go inside and ask the employee for a shower key. This place needs some ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ women eventually left after 10 mins. I knocked on the door to ask if it‚Äôs possible to use one of the shower bathrooms instead but to my surprise no one was in the bathroom and it was not being cleaned. The toilets were filthy. I left and ‚Ä¶

If your thinking about it dnt it‚Äôs a pilot 10 miles dwn the road. The staff here stole my husbands $4,000 ring, we showered and left it on the sink and wen we can back to get it no one had a clue.. mind u management said the crime rate was ‚Ä¶

Very friendly people cleaning restrooms. And the showers a little small, but very clean. I go to Danville to take the shower. About twice a week. And if you have any issues the manager Mike, will definitely help you out in anyway very ‚Ä¶

My husband is a truck driver and we stopped here last night for a shower. The cashier Renae was so nice and gave us a large shower and we really appreciate it. The restrooms were so clean as was the whole store. Everything was organized and ‚Ä¶

Small truck stop but quiet nights sleep. Only 3 showers but they gave us the largest one. The water was hot,  pressure was good, and ventilation actually worked. The shower nozzle; however, sprayed water all over the ceiling. The staff was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I found this little pilot. Small parking lot so get there early because the staff here are awesome. Very friendly and outgoing. Showers were nice and clean too. Even the people working at Arbys were great. Clean shower, hot food and great ‚Ä¶
My shower rewards was not correct.  Manager gave me shower for free even though I would have had shower in rewards.  I greatly appreciate his and his help.

Rolled in to a real clean shower, the app will say there not available but just ask the front desk for one there still not operating with the key pad instead you'll get a Key. Lot kinda of small limited spaces but there's the side road next ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ middle of nowhere with no wifi again. We'll, im happy to say that the connection is great, the arby's im eating while gaming is great, and the feeling of clean hair after my warm shower is great. Thank's so much for having a good truckstop ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Not professional at all ! I used my app to receive my shower when I use the pin I found someone else using the shower when I talked to the lady at the counter she says we give priority to people who pay showers at counter than who used app ‚Ä¶

Shower cleaning man too slow more focus on chatting with ladies and fixing his music
1rst in line and empty showers took 1.20 minutes to get shower . Ovoid showering in this miserable poor place

Nice  " little " truck stop. Staff is friendly. Store, bathroom and shower was nice and clean . Getting fuel not bad, parking is very limited. This is not a place for practice making turns and  park. First driveway is the entrance for ‚Ä¶

Not many places for travelers or truckers to park, it‚Äôs very small. Showers were immaculate however. Complete with a toilet, mirror, towels, and complimentary soap, as well as a stool for sitting and getting ready for the day on. Hooks to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the extra mile. I am a one-armed person (left arm nerve surgery) walked into the store and they made it very possible and pleasant for me from fueling the truck to even helping me with a plastic bag and tape to wrap my arm for a shower. ‚Ä¶
Horrible place! No parking! Came here at 4am to take a shower and was told that they cannot give me a shower while I‚Äôm sitting on the pump. FYI all pumps are open

Bathrooms and showers are super dirty. I was told by cashier to not "be picky" when I asked to buy a shower. I realized why he said that when I saw my shower room. It was dirty and the toilet was stained with you know what.. .
Traveled across the country and stopped at a bunch of travel centers... Very consistently clean and FRIENDLY.... Even took a shower since we were in our travel van.... So nice!!
Worest pilot I ever been to. Small parking lot you can‚Äôt even park for shower. Very very very small and would not recommend for truckers.
Small store clean, organized. Thanks for the gesture left in my shower, it wasnt much, but it made my day. ü§óü§ó ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ better if I came earlier.  My puppy loved his burger (thank you). Shower was a bit small but extra extra hot (loved that) could use a place bigger than the small chair in there for a lady to put her bag on. Cashiers were amazing as hell. ( ‚Ä¶

Sorry, I walked in after a rough day and just needed a relaxing shower. The only stall is in the men's bathroom tucked in a back corner closet. I'm 6'2" 195lbs and I barely had room to move around with my small bag (small duffel). The ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but she let 1 of her regulars jump in front of me and another trucker and I overheard her telling him that her regulars come 1st. Overall, it‚Äôs not a bad place to stay or eat. Don‚Äôt know about the bathroom or shower. I didn‚Äôt use either one

Was here for 2 days, food was good at The Little River Grill.  Shower was small and they do not provide towels for $7.00.  When I was getting ready to leave went to put garbage in dumpster, just happened to catch the girl as she unlocked it ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , juices, etc. They have a nice kitchen hot n cold foods section with good meals, and a generous open areas of tables. They have one small Shower in Men Room, 7 bucks, bring your own towels, glad for that to. Friendly staff of employees. ‚Ä¶

My fiance is a truck driver and stopped here for his 10 hours.  He was hoping to get a shower based on the website for this truck stop.  No showers to be found AND he said they were so rude to him.  Only good thing was he had a place to ‚Ä¶

We didn‚Äôt eat here.  Just used the showers and got fuel.  The showers were awful.  No towels provided, but after the shower experience I wouldn‚Äôt have wanted to use their towel.  The shower was very small and dirty.  The water was the only ‚Ä¶
Great service, and they have  a shower and great food üëç ‚Ä¶
No food, one nasty shower in the men's room,  not for the professional driver!!

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place, just glad they have a very decent shower, clean, and cant ask for too much;)

‚Ä¶ . I have a puppy in my truck that got sick. Asked if I could shower my dog,was told "no state of Virginia has laws against animals being in areas with prepped food". Absolutely not true,because any other truck stop in Virginia allows dogs ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the lady said upstairs. Went upstairs, and the place was full waiting to use the 2 unisex bathrooms. I noticed that one of the many shower doors was open. I walked over, and there was a cleaning lady in their cleaning. I asked if we could ‚Ä¶

Absolutely horrible!! Came here as a trucker for a 10 hour break and shower and it will be the last time. Huge craters in the parking lot, spots all on horrible slants, and the shower was FILTHY. The entire upstairs reeks of urine, and ‚Ä¶
75 gallons of fuel gets a free shower. Cheaper fuel. Staff is always great too. Showers are nice drivers room upstairs. Easy in easy out. I usally always stop here as a owner operator

This place is horrible and disgusting! Went to take a shower and there were bugs crawling and flying everywhere. There was no air conditioning, just a 20yr old beat up box fan covered in oil and dirt. Towels were stained with black oil ‚Ä¶

$5 Shower with fuel purchase. $10 without fuel. Has Subway restaurant. Store sells sandwiches, pizza, hotdogs, etc. Clean facility. Trucker lounge upstairs. Adequate parking. Unable to get food deliveries in this area....
I'm just a tourist, but it seemed like a nice place for truckers to lounge, shower and eat. I ate there at subway. It was good.
It's a great place that has so many things to explore and a whole upstairs to explore and shower and wash clothes in

showerReviews.reviewText: I was only the third person in line for a shower. I waited 30 minutes before I finally got a shower. I order a pork chop dinner afterwards, I bought an extra side which was corn. The serving and portion I was giving was the equivalent of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restroom it was gross 3 sinks and only one was letting out a drop or two what the hell. Laundry room had at least 4 machines out of service Dam this place is run down.  I didn't dare to shower hell no. My advice is enter at your own risk.

‚Ä¶ is an complete and total lie. You should be ashamed. Ive been to a lot of hole in the walls and have NEVER seen anything like the nastiness i just witnessed. I have to go shower at loves just because I used your bathroom! Disgusting!!!!

‚Ä¶ or not but it‚Äôs the summertime!! AC NOT working. Who wants to sit here and wait for a shower when it‚Äôs 80 degrees inside and 90 degrees outside. How do you expect people to work in these conditions? Let alone drink a dang cup of coffee ‚Ä¶
I can't believe I got up extra early to take a shower, but it was closed because no one was there to clean!!
They charge me for a two credit points from my app and dont give me a shower
‚Ä¶ People have come in and gone don't even wash their hands afterwards. Shower was cleaned ok. They've got two restaurants for food and plenty of parking.

‚Ä¶ 3 fuel pumps are working! Cashier couldn't honor the prices displayed. Water pressure in the showers are so low that you literally have to stand directly under the shower head. Then to top that off I order a chicken dinner and the server ‚Ä¶
I have come to expect a filthy shower, but when leave a used wash cloth in the shower, goes to show they really do NOT care at all!!

Not clean shower! It's independent TA plaza so don't have everything other (Real) TA around the country have! They don't accept apple/google/... pay... which is not safe transactions for over $15. Barely can see staffs with smile but make ‚Ä¶
